alert.note: Alert for Clay; Mahnomen; Norman; West Becker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 20 at 8:01PM CST until December 22 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST WEDNESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Norman, Clay, Mahnomen and West Becker Counties. In North Dakota, Cass County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 3 AM CST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 AM Wednesday to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. If outside, make sure you wear appropriate winter clothing. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
